sections.title: Vampire Hunter (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Vampire Hunter class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, light and medium armor, and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Detect Undead (Sp) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Allows at-will use of detect undead spell and can identify undead creatures as a move action within 60 feet.

sections.title: Technique Feat (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Grants bonus combat feats or vampire hunting technique feats at 1st level and every 3 levels thereafter, with feat retraining options.

sections.title: Track (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Adds half vampire hunter level to Survival checks made to follow tracks.

sections.title: Vampiric Focus (Su) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Allows activation of vampiric powers as a swift action for minutes per day equal to level, with only one focus active at a time.

sections.title: Relentless (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Allows travel for 16 hours per day without forced march penalties, requiring Fortitude saves for extended travel.

sections.title: Stake (Su) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Treats any piercing weapon or sharp tool driven through a vampire's heart as a wooden stake.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Grants divine spellcasting using inquisitor spell list up to 4th level spells, with Wisdom-based casting.

sections.title: Relentless Band (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Extends relentless travel benefits to companions equal to half vampire hunter level plus their mounts.

sections.title: Vampire Tracker (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Allows tracking of gaseous creatures like vampires in gaseous form with base DC 20 Survival checks.

sections.title: Swift Tracker (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Removes movement penalties when tracking, allowing normal speed tracking without penalty and reduced penalty at double speed.

sections.title: Vampire Bane (Su) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Uses holy symbols to repel vampires with Will saves, forcing them to maintain distance and preventing melee attacks.

sections.title: Remove Vampirism (Su) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Prevents creatures killed by vampires from rising as vampire spawn by using holy water in a 10-minute ritual.

sections.title: Quarry (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Designates an undead target as quarry, granting tracking bonuses, attack bonuses, and automatic critical confirmation.

sections.title: Critical Reflexes (Su) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Upon critical hits against undead, allows immediate use of items through combat maneuver checks, including staking vampires.

sections.title: Improved Quarry (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Enhances quarry selection to free action, allows taking 20 on tracking, increases attack bonus, and reduces quarry selection cooldown.

sections.title: Master Vampire Hunter (Ex) (Vampire Hunter)
sections.description: Makes single attacks against undead quarry with destroy, stake, or paralyze effects, plus permanent vampiric focus activation.
